encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Review transcriptions carefully (see lunate sigma in v.5, and the faulty document division), and review all metadata before finalization.

Submit - Since PSI 17 1660 is a fragment of the same codex of P. Palaurib. Lit. 10, I have worked on the already existing record of P. Palaurib. Lit. 10, adding the texts of both papyri and the new metadata for PSI. In the metadata section, I have changed the Display Name from “P. Palaurib. Lit. 10” to “P. Palaurib. Lit. 10 + PSI 17 1660” but I am not sure if the sign “+” goes well. I have specified which passages are transmitted by which papyri in the “General notes” section.

Commit - Since PSI 17 1660 is a fragment of the same codex of P. Palaurib. Lit. 10, I have worked on the already existing record of P. Palaurib. Lit. 10, adding the texts of both papyri and the new metadata for PSI. In the metadata section, I have changed the Display Name from “P. Palaurib. Lit. 10” to “P. Palaurib. Lit. 10 + PSI 17 1660” but I am not sure if the sign “+” goes well. I have specified which passages are transmitted by which papyri in the "General notes" section.
Finalized - This is good to go.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Review transcriptions carefully (see lunate sigma in v.5, and the faulty document division), and review all metadata before finalization.
